title: 02/25/22 DPS Hour 2 - Doug Gottlieb & Jason Smith Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 02/25/22 DPS Hour 2 - Doug Gottlieb & Jason Smith Guest Hosting
description:
Doug and Jason address the Eric Bienemy situation. Doug thinks if Eric Bienemy was the right fit for a team, he would have gotten a head coaching job by now. Lakers insider Bill Oram joins the guys to talk about the acrimony between Lebron, his camp and the Lakers. Doug and Jason give their thoughts on the Nets post-Harden. Plus, the guys talk about the most entertaining coach ejection from Thursday night.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
